objects.text:
• 925 Sterling Silver
• Elegant Rose Gold Finish
• Diamond-like Brilliance
• Perfect Gift for Her

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

banner_details:
This banner features an elegant, feminine design that highlights a luxurious pair of rose gold earrings. The layout is split into four soft pastel pink quadrants with subtle texture elements like abstract waves and dotted patterns for visual interest. At the top-left quadrant, the heading ("heading") uses a bold serif font in a deep rose shade, followed by a subheading ("subheading") in a softer serif font emphasizing the product name. Underneath, the tagline text ("tagline") in a sleek, futuristic typeface conveys luxury. A high-resolution product image ("product_image") is centered prominently on the right section. Below, a descriptive bullet list ("description") details key features. The price ("price") stands out in bold, dark pink, followed by a rounded button ("cta_background") containing “SHOP NOW” text ("cta").  

**Color Palette:**  
- #FFF5F5 (Soft Blush)  
- #FFE8EA (Light Rose)  
- #FADCD9 (Peach Pink)  
- #F8D0D3 (Rosy Pink)  
- #F1B5B5 (Muted Coral)  
- #7D2E45 (Deep Rosewood - text)  
- #D68193 (Muted Cherry - accent text)  
- #C98A97 (Dusty Rose - CTA background)  
- #FFFFFF (White - CTA text)
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of earrings with an elegant blend of rose gold and brilliant white gemstones. The dominant color is a soft, warm rose gold (#F4A6A6), forming the base and structural design, offering a luxurious and feminine charm. This is complemented by sparkling white crystals (#FFFFFF) and translucent diamond-like elements (#E1E1E1) that highlight the sophistication of the piece. The subtle mixing of rose gold and brilliant crystalline accents creates a refined contrast that enhances both textures. For a promotional banner, use a palette of Rose Gold (#F4A6A6), Crystal White (#FFFFFF), Champagne Pink (#FADADD), and Light Silver (#E1E1E1).
